articles.author: Sophie Kiderlin
articles.title: Apple reaches deal with EU regulators to open up mobile payments system to rivals - CNBC
articles.description: EU antitrust chief Margrethe Vestager said the European Commission accepted commitments from Apple to open access to its tap and go payments tech to rivals.
articles.content:
EU antitrust regulators on Thursday accepted commitments from Apple to allow access to its tap and go payments technology to rivals, bringing an end to a four-year investigation.
"The commission has… [+2643 chars]

articles.title: Budget 2024 stock ideas: MOSL picks 8 largecaps including ICICI Bank, HCL Tech and 6 midcaps including KEI Industries - Mint
articles.description: MOSL recommends top large-cap and mid-cap investment ideas for the upcoming budget. Large-cap picks include ICICI Bank, HCL Tech, Coal India, SBI, L&T, M&M, Mankind Pharma, and Chola Invest.
articles.content: After consolidating in May 2024, the Nifty index closed 6.6 percent higher in June 2024. The return of the NDA government, combined with strong macroeconomic factors such as 8.2 percent GDP growth in… [+7811 chars]

articles.title: Lava Blaze X 5G launched in India: Check price, specifications and more - Mint
articles.description: Indian tech company Lava launches Blaze X 5G smartphone with 120Hz AMOLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 6300 processor. Available in 4GB, 6GB, and 8GB RAM variants. Scheduled for July 20 release in Starlight Purple and Titanium Grey colors with Rs. 1,000 discou…
articles.content: Indian tech company Lava has unveiled its latest smartphone, the Blaze X 5G, marking its entry into the 5G smartphone market. The smartphone from Lava features a 120Hz curved AMOLED display and it is… [+1936 chars]

articles.title: Ariane 6 Ignites a New Era in Next-Gen Space Launch Technology - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Ariane 6, Europe's new heavy-lift rocket, made its inaugural flight from Europe's Spaceport in French Guiana at 16:00 local time on July 9 (20:00 BST, 21:00 CEST). Ariane 6 is the latest in Europe's Ariane rocket series, taking over from Ariane 5, and featuri…
articles.content:
Ariane 6 launches to the sky on July 9, 2024, from Europe’s Spaceport in French Guiana. Credit: ESA – S. Corvaja
